rules_text:
Flying, break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Whenever this Vehicle attacks, another target attacking creature can’t be blocked this turn.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes:
2.1.0: Changed to a 4-mana 4/4. Supports a broader shift of the archetype into commiting to a slower but bulkier aggressive playstyle.
2.2.1: Swapped with the interceptor lailah to be the new evasive izzet vehicle that can trigger break and help get other things through.
